attributes.action: Review foreign travel advice for Libya
attributes.additional_details: Doing so could lead to flights to Libya being resumed, which we believe would greatly benefit those with family, business, and humanitarian ties to Libya while also strengthening bilateral relations.
attributes.background: I kindly request the Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office review its travel advice regarding travel to Libya.
